column4: anyone got svideo out working?  i see the computer "booting up" on the tv, but when X kicks in, the television "flashes" but stays blank.
dunno, gimme like 2 mins and i'll tell ya :)
it should try to enable all attached monitors
any other suggestions?  im using an ati card if that helps
ATI cards... multihead is only working on the older ones
its a radeon8500... using the "ati" driver
this wouldn't happen to be an old PowerBook or iBook?
no this is a desktop machine i built
that's odd, it really is supposed to work.
well thats good, at least i know to keep trying
does "xrandr" output descriptions of the monitor and the TV?
it just showed screen0 as vga
